_meanings:
{@--1@} To choose,
like; <ab>cf.</ab> {#vAvft#}.

{@--2@} To distribute,
divide.

To
shine.

_gram:
({#vartate#}, but Paras.
also in the Aorist, Second Future
and Conditional; also in the 
Desiderative; {#vavfte, avftat-avartizwa#}, 
{#vartizyate-vartsyati, vartituM, vftta#})
_meanings:
{@--2@} To be in any 
particular condition or circumstances;  
{#paScipe vayasi vartamAnasya#} <ls>K.</ls>; so {#duHKe#},
{#harze, vizAde#} &c. {#vartate#}.

{@--5@} To be maintained or 
supported by, live on, subsist by (<ab>fig.</ab>
also); {#PalamUlavAriBirvartamAnA#} <ls>K. 172</ls>;
<ls>Ms. 3. 77.</ls>

{@--9@} To act a part,
enter upon a course of conduct;
{#sADvIM vuttiM vartate#} ‘he acts an honest
part’.
{@--13@} To rest or depend upon.
{@--1@} To cause to be or exist.

{@--4@} To do, practise, exhibit;
<ls>Māl. 9. 33.</ls>

{@--6@} To
spend, pass (as time).

{@--8@}
To relate, describe.

{@--9@} To perceive,
comprehend.
{@--10@} To study.

{@--11@} To
shine.
{@--12@} To speak.

{@--13@} To shed
(as tears).
